g.text: The user initiated some sort of account linking by choosing the appropriate DFSP from a screen inside the PISP application.
authChannels: [ "OTP" ], // This is updated with the channel in use
authUri: null // This is new, but left blank
Here, the DFSP sends an OTP directly to the user (e.g., via SMS).
authChannels: [ "OTP" ], // This is updated with the channel in use
authUri: null // This is new, but left blank
At this point, the PISP knows that the OTP authChannel is in use and the PISP App should prompt the user to provide the OTP.
